DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test long-term safety tolerability oral aripiprazole adolescent patient schizophrenia .
DOC.criteria: Subjects confirm Axis I Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , Fourth Edition ( DSMIV ) diagnosis schizophrenia must complete Otsuka study 3103241 ( NCT00102518 ) treatment adolescent subject schizophrenia Patients comorbid serious , uncontrolled systemic illness Patients significant risk commit suicide
